The class has been successfully dropped.
Call Center owners or their agents who d: Call Center owners or their agents who drop from a client certification in which they are enrolled may not be eligible to express interest in future programs for up to 30 days (as indicated in the program announcements). All fees and funds paid are forfeited and no refunds are given. Dropping from this opportunity is non-reversible. You will not be able to get back into the class once dropped.
This Policy applies to drops made before: This Policy applies to drops made before the actual start of the course and drops made during a certification course.
You are requesting to drop this client c: You are requesting to drop this client certification course. To continue, please choose the appropriate drop reason and select Drop Class.
Drops due to Bereavement, Military order: Drops due to Bereavement, Military orders or Jury Duty should be canceled via AVA, Ask 'How to Drop a Client Course' and follow the prompts to speak to live specialist.

uniqueIdentification.title: Enter Aadhaar Number
uniqueIdentification.brief: The spotify® Platform is trusted by thousands of users. We keep all your information private. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy. Your Aadhaar number will be validated. Please ensure your name is entered as shown on your Aadhaar card.

uniqueIdentification.indiviualTaxIdCheckBoxModalDescription: By selecting 'I do not have a VAT ID number', you are confirming that you are not registered for Goods and Services Tax (VAT ID) in India. This may impact :
uniqueIdentification.indiviualTaxIdCheckBoxModalTitle: By clicking on Agree you are confirming that you are not registered for Goods and Services Tax (VAT ID) in India. This may impact :
uniqueIdentification.indiviualTaxIdCheckBoxModalContent:
• Tax implications: You may be responsible for paying taxes on services received from spotify Virtual Solutions depending on your location and business activity.

  • Invoice format: Your invoices will not reflect any VAT ID amount.

Please note: It is your responsibility to determine your VAT ID registration requirements.You can find more information on VAT ID registration on the Government of India VAT ID website.

Do you need further assisCompany IDce? If you are unsure about your VAT ID registration status, we recommend consulting with a tax advisor.

By clicking on Agree, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this information.

companyDetails.smallBusinessTooltip: Small Business:A small business is defined one with worldwide yearly revenue less than $30,000 (CAD). A year is defined as the last four consecutive calendar quarters
companyDetails.largeBusinessTooltip: Large Business:A large business is defined as one with worldwide yearly revenue greater than $30,000 (CAD). A year is defined as the last four consecutive calendar quarters.

switching program: Please tell us why you would like to switch programs. Choose all that apply.

No-Show-Purpose: ? bubble copy – Client opportunities on the spotify<sup>®</sup> Platform are in high demand. In recent months, we have seen no-shows on the first day of class reach unprecedented levels. When you do not show up to a class, this leaves that place empty for the duration of the entire class. We are looking to minimize the impact of this trend with the Class Confirmation Deposit
Drop Policy Text: Service Partners and their agents will be ineligible to enroll in any opportunities if they have a dropped status from three or more opportunities in the preceding 90 days, whether these opportunities are for the same client program or different ones. They will be allowed to express interest only when they have two or fewer drops within a rolling 90-day period.
